Less than 10kg=6mg/kg monthly for 3 doses then 3mg/kg monthly beginning 1 month after last loading dose

20kg and over=3mg/kg monthly for 3 doses then 3mg/kg every 3 months beginning 1 month after the last loading dose

Less than 10kg=3mg/kg monthly
10kg to <20kg=6mg/kg every 3 months
20kg and over=3mg/kg every 3 months
